newsitem.title: USA: IKOS Systems to make direct sales in Japan.
newsitem.headline: IKOS Systems to make direct sales in Japan.

text.p: A unit of IKOS Systems Inc said early Monday that it is expanding its Japanese subsidiary to make direct sales to customers.
The direct sales by IKOS Systems K.K. are to begin immediately to customers in Japan, it said.
The IKOS K.K. organisation was formed in 1995 as part of IKOS Systems' international business strategy and initially supported a network of distributor relationships throughout Asia.

"The ability to sell directly to our customers in Japan means that we can deliver solutions more effectively and at a lower investment to our customer," IKOS Systems President and Chief Executive Ramon Nunez said in a statement.
